education.name: Conventry University
education.modules: Android app development,iPhone app devellopment, Embedded microprocessors, Object Oriented Software, Network Systems Archictecture, Operating Systems, Security and Network
education.dissertaionProjectDescription: Simulation where agents would move around a site and pick up randomly generated shipping containers and place them in a certain location based on the agents weight,type and export date.The agent would have to move around the area and avoid collisions with other agents whilst working out the shortest path to its goal using the A* pathfinding algorithm.The simulation was programmed in C# running in the unity game engine.
education.name: Haberdashers' Askes Hatcham College
